info.name: Equity Crowdfunding with NestJS + PostgreSQL + MongoDB
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for equity crowdfunding platform built with NestJS, supporting dual database architecture (PostgreSQL & MongoDB) with JWT authentication, campaign management, user management, and file uploads.

item.name: ADMIN
Authorized
üë§ Admin Management

request.description: Get current admin profile information including personal details and settings.
Get all admins with pagination and filtering options. Supports filtering by name, email, and active status.
Get admin details by their public ID.

formdata.description: Admin profile photo (PNG, JPG, JPEG)

request.description: Create a new admin with optional photo upload. Supports multipart form data.
Update admin information (excluding password). All fields are optional.
Delete admin by public ID. Also cleans up associated files.
Update admin password. Requires current password verification.
Logout current admin session. Logs the logout action for audit purposes.

item.description: Admin profile management endpoints for authenticated admins. Includes profile operations, password management, and admin CRUD functionality.

item.name: üóÑÔ∏è Cache Management

request.description: Get cache statistics for settings.

variable.description:
recaptcha-setting
google-map-setting
newsletter-setting
project-setting
date-and-time-setting
amount-setting
email-setting
maintenance-mode-setting
revenue-setting

request.description: Clear cache for a specific group type.
Clear all settings cache.

item.description: Cache management endpoints for settings optimization and performance.

item.name: üåç Countries Management

request.description: Admin endpoint to retrieve all countries with pagination and filtering.
Admin endpoint to retrieve a specific country by its public ID.

formdata.description: Country flag image (PNG, JPG, JPEG)

request.description: Admin endpoint to create a new country with flag upload.

formdata.description: Updated country flag image (PNG, JPG, JPEG)

request.description: Admin endpoint to update a country with optional flag upload.
Admin endpoint to delete a country (only if useCount is 0).
Admin endpoint to update multiple countries at once.
Admin endpoint to delete multiple countries at once (only if useCount is 0 for each).

item.description: Countries management endpoints for dynamic country configuration with flag uploads and bulk operations.

item.name: üí∞ Currencies Management

request.description: Admin endpoint to retrieve all currencies with pagination and filtering.
Admin endpoint to retrieve a specific currency by its public ID.
Admin endpoint to create a new currency. All fields are required except status (defaults to true).
Admin endpoint to update an existing currency. All fields are optional.
Admin endpoint to delete a currency. Only allowed if useCount is 0 (currency is not in use).
Admin endpoint to update the status of multiple currencies. Set status to true to activate or false to deactivate.
Admin endpoint to delete multiple currencies. Only allowed if all currencies have useCount = 0.

item.description: Currencies management endpoints for multi-currency support with ISO codes, symbols, and use count tracking.

item.name: üîß Settings Management
üì± 1. Recaptcha Settings

request.description: Get recaptcha settings for admin management.

formdata.description: Enable reCAPTCHA for admin login // Possible values: true, false
Enable reCAPTCHA for frontend signup // Possible values: true, false
Enable reCAPTCHA for contact us form // Possible values: true, false
Enable reCAPTCHA for newsletter subscription // Possible values: true, false

request.description: Create or update recaptcha settings for various forms.
Delete all recaptcha settings.

item.description: reCAPTCHA configuration settings for forms validation and spam protection.

item.name: üó∫Ô∏è 2. Google Map Settings

request.description: Get Google Maps settings for admin management.

formdata.description: Google Maps API key for location services
Comma-separated list of country codes to restrict map to
Enable country restriction for Google Maps // Possible values: yes, no

request.description: Create or update Google Maps configuration settings.
Delete all Google Maps settings.

item.description: Google Maps integration settings for location services and map restrictions.

item.name: üìß 3. Newsletter Settings

request.description: Get newsletter settings for admin management.

formdata.description: Mailchimp list ID for contact us submissions
Mailchimp API key for newsletter integration
Mailchimp list ID for newsletter subscriptions
Mailchimp list ID for user signups

request.description: Create or update newsletter and email list configuration.
Delete all newsletter settings.

item.description: Newsletter and email list management settings for Mailchimp integration.

item.name: üöÄ 4. Project Settings

request.description: Get project settings for admin management.

formdata.description: Maximum number of campaigns allowed per user
Days before campaign auto-ends
Require pre-approval for campaign goals // Possible values: true, false
Allow interest requests for campaigns // Possible values: true, false
Enable KYC verification // Possible values: true, false
Make KYC verification mandatory // Possible values: true, false
Enable accreditation requirements // Possible values: true, false
Provide contract copies to investors // Possible values: true, false
Require investor accreditation // Possible values: yes, no
Enable contract management // Possible values: true, false
Enable document type selection // Possible values: true, false
Minimum campaign goal amount
Maximum campaign goal amount
Minimum campaign duration in days
Maximum campaign duration in days
Minimum investment amount per transaction
Maximum investment amount per transaction
Access request functionality status
Allow custom FAQs for campaigns // Possible values: true, false
Days before saved investments expire

request.description: Create or update project and campaign configuration settings.
Delete all project settings.

item.description: Project and campaign management settings including limits, validation, and workflow controls.

item.name: üìÖ 5. Date and Time Settings

request.description: Get date and time settings for admin management.

formdata.description: Date display format // Possible values: YYYY-MM-DD, DD MMMM, YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY, DD-MM-YYYY, YYYY/MM/DD, MM/DD/YYYY, DD/MM/YYYY
Time display format // Possible values: hh:mm A, HH:mm

request.description: Create or update date and time formatting settings.
Delete all date and time settings.

item.description: Date and time formatting configuration for consistent display across the application.

item.name: üí∞ 6. Amount Settings

request.description: Get amount and currency settings for admin management.

formdata.description: Currency symbol position // Possible values: leftCode, leftSpaceCode, rightCode, rightSpaceCode
Number of decimal places for amounts // Possible values: 0, 1, 2

request.description: Create or update currency and amount formatting settings.
Delete all amount settings.

item.description: Currency and amount formatting settings for consistent financial displays.

item.name: üìß 7. Email Settings

request.description: Get email configuration for admin management.

formdata.description: From email address for outgoing emails
SMTP host server address
SMTP authentication username
SMTP port number
Email service provider name
Email provider type // Possible values: SMTP, sendgrid, sendinblue
SMTP authentication password (encrypted)

request.description: Create or update email server configuration.
Delete all email settings.

item.description: Email server configuration and SMTP settings for application email functionality.

item.name: üõ†Ô∏è 8. Maintenance Mode Settings

request.description: Get maintenance mode settings for admin management.

formdata.description: Enable maintenance mode // Possible values: yes, no
Comma-separated list of IP addresses allowed during maintenance

request.description: Create or update maintenance mode configuration.
Delete all maintenance settings.

item.description: Maintenance mode configuration for scheduled downtime and system updates.

item.name: üíπ 9. Revenue Settings

request.description: Get revenue settings for admin management.

formdata.description: Enable investor investment fees // Possible values: true, false
Investor investment percentage fee (number)
Investor investment flat fee amount (number)
Enable investor operations fees // Possible values: true, false
Investor operations percentage fee (number)
Investor operations flat fee amount (number)
Enable investor repayment fees // Possible values: true, false
Investor repayment percentage fee (number)
Investor repayment flat fee amount (number)
Enable investor subscription plans // Possible values: true, false
Investor subscription duration // Possible values: MONTHLY, QUARTERLY, YEARLY
Sponsor project types allowed // Possible values: BOTH, FLEXIBLE, FIXED
Sponsor fixed project percentage fee (number)
Sponsor fixed project flat fee amount (number)
Sponsor flexible project successful percentage fee (number)
Sponsor flexible project successful flat fee amount (number)
Sponsor flexible project unsuccessful percentage fee (number)
Sponsor flexible project unsuccessful flat fee amount (number)
Enable sponsor project listing fees // Possible values: true, false
Sponsor project listing fee type // Possible values: SUBSCRIPTION, PER_PROJECT
Sponsor project listing flat fee amount (number)
Enable sponsor marketing resource fees // Possible values: true, false
Sponsor marketing resource flat fee amount (number)

formdata.value: Professional marketing package including social media promotion and campaign optimization
formdata.description: Description of sponsor marketing resource services (string)
Enable sponsor sales resource fees // Possible values: true, false
Sponsor sales resource flat fee amount (number)

formdata.value: Dedicated sales support and investor outreach services
formdata.description: Description of sponsor sales resource services (string)
Enable sponsor subscription plans // Possible values: true, false
Sponsor subscription duration // Possible values: MONTHLY, QUARTERLY, YEARLY

request.description: Create or update comprehensive revenue and fee configuration settings.
Delete all revenue settings.

item.description: Comprehensive revenue model configuration including investor fees, sponsor fees, and subscription settings.
Settings management endpoints for dynamic application configuration with cache management.

item.name: üåê Languages Management

request.description: Admin endpoint to retrieve all languages with pagination and filtering.
Admin endpoint to retrieve a specific language by its public ID.

formdata.description: YES / NO
Language flag image (PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG)

request.description: Admin endpoint to create a new language with flag image upload.

formdata.description: YES / NO
Updated language flag image (PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG)

request.description: Admin endpoint to update a language with optional flag image upload.
Admin endpoint to delete a language (only if isDefault is NO).
Admin endpoint to update multiple languages status at once.
Admin endpoint to delete multiple languages at once (only if isDefault is NO for each).

item.description: Languages management endpoints for dynamic language configuration with flag uploads and bulk operations. Supports multi-language application features with ISO codes and text direction settings.

item.name: üìã Manage Dropdown

request.description: Admin endpoint to retrieve all dropdowns with pagination and filtering by type and language.
Admin endpoint to retrieve a specific dropdown by its public ID with language details.
Admin endpoint to create a new dropdown item with language association.
Admin endpoint to update a specific dropdown by its public ID.
Admin endpoint to delete a dropdown by its unique code (all language variants). Only allowed if useCount is 0.
Admin endpoint to update the status of multiple dropdown options. Set status to true to activate or false to deactivate.
Admin endpoint to delete multiple dropdown options. Only allowed if all dropdown options have useCount = 0.

item.description: Manage dropdown endpoints for dynamic dropdown data management with multi-language support. Supports CRUD operations, bulk actions, and language-specific filtering.

item.name: üí∞ Revenue Subscriptions Management

request.description: Admin endpoint to retrieve all revenue subscriptions with pagination, filtering, and search capabilities.

body.raw:
{
  "subscriptionType": "INVESTOR",
  "amount": 99.99,
  "maxInvestmentAllowed": 50000,
  "maxProjectAllowed": 10,
  "maxProjectGoalLimit": 1000000,
  "allowRefund": true,
  "allowRefundDays": 30,
  "allowCancel": true,
  "allowCancelDays": 7,
  "secondaryMarketAccess": true,
  "earlyBirdAccess": true,
  "languageId": "{{ENGLISH_LANG_ID}}",
  "title": "Premium Investor Plan",
  "description": "Comprehensive investment plan with advanced features and flexible terms."
}

request.description: Admin endpoint to create new revenue subscription with multi-language content support.
Admin endpoint to retrieve single revenue subscription by public ID with language content.

body.raw:
{
  "amount": 149.99,
  "maxInvestmentAllowed": 75000,
  "allowRefundDays": 45,
  "secondaryMarketAccess": false,
  "languageId": "{{ENGLISH_LANG_ID}}",
  "title": "Premium Investor Plan - Updated",
  "description": "Enhanced investment plan with improved terms and higher limits."
}

request.description: Admin endpoint to update revenue subscription by public ID with partial data and language content.
Admin endpoint to delete revenue subscription. Deletes all language variants. Cannot delete if useCount > 0.
Admin endpoint to update status of multiple revenue subscriptions at once.
Admin endpoint to delete multiple revenue subscriptions. Cannot delete if any subscription has useCount > 0.

item.description: Revenue subscription management endpoints for subscription plan configuration with multi-language support, financial limits, and bulk operations. Supports INVESTOR and SPONSOR subscription types with conditional field validation.

item.name: üéØ Sliders Management

request.description: Admin endpoint to retrieve all sliders with pagination and filtering by language, title, and unique code.
Admin endpoint to retrieve a specific slider by its public ID.

formdata.value: Explore cutting-edge projects and innovative startups seeking funding to bring their ideas to life.

formdata.description: Slider image (PNG, JPG, JPEG, WEBP, SVG - max 5MB)

request.description: Admin endpoint to create a new slider with image upload. Creates entries for all active languages automatically.

formdata.value: Updated description for this amazing slider

formdata.description: New slider image (optional)

request.description: Admin endpoint to update a slider. All fields are optional.
Admin endpoint to delete a slider and all its language variants. Also deletes associated image files.
Admin endpoint to update multiple sliders status at once.
Admin endpoint to delete multiple sliders. Deletes all language variants and associated image files.

item.description: Sliders management endpoints for dynamic slider configuration with image uploads and bulk operations. Supports multi-language slider features with color customization and URL linking.

item.name: Non-Authorized
üîê Admin Authentication

exec: console.log('Admin JWT token saved to environment variables');

request.description: Admin login with email and password. Returns JWT access token for admin authentication.
Request admin password reset token. Sends reset token via email.
Reset admin password using token received via email.

item.description: Admin authentication endpoints including login and password recovery. Login automatically sets ADMIN_JWT environment variable.

Public admin endpoints that do not require authentication.
Complete admin management system with JWT authentication, CRUD operations, and password management. Supports dual database architecture and file uploads.

item.name: üë§ User Management

request.description: Get authenticated user's profile information including personal details and settings.

body.raw:
{
  "firstName": "John Updated",
  "lastName": "Doe Updated",
  "phoneNumber": "+1234567891",
  "userLocation": "San Francisco, CA",
  "zipcode": "94102",
  "aboutYourself": "Updated profile description",
  "photo": "https://example.com/photo.jpg",
  "coverPhoto": "https://example.com/cover.jpg",
  "outsideLinks": [
    {
      "title": "Updated LinkedIn",
      "url": "https://linkedin.com/in/johnupdated"
    }
  ],
  "walletAddress": "0x742d35Cc6335CAA4C7A5B7a5a9C5B0E1234567890"
}

request.description: Update authenticated user's profile information. All fields are optional.
Change user password. Requires current password verification.
Get user profile by their unique slug identifier.
Deactivate user account. This sets the account status to inactive without permanent deletion.

item.description: User profile management endpoints for authenticated users. Includes profile viewing, updating, password changes, and account management.

item.name: üè¢ Campaign

request.description: Get all campaigns owned by the authenticated user with pagination and filtering options.
Get detailed campaign information with all relations (team, investors, FAQs, etc.). Requires campaign ownership.

body.raw:
{
    "companyLogo": "https://example.com/logo.jpg",
    "companyName": "TechStartup Inc.",
    "companyTagline": "Revolutionary tech solution for modern businesses",
    "companyEmail": "company@example.com",
    "companyPhoneNumber": "+919876543210",
    "companyAddress": "Vadodara, Gujarat, India",
    "yearFounded": 2025,
    "website": "https://example.com/",
    "companyCategory": "Technology",
    "companyIndustry": "Software Development",
    "companyDescription": "We are building the future of business automation with cutting-edge AI solutions"
}

request.description: Create a new equity crowdfunding campaign. This is Step 1 of the campaign creation process.

formdata.description: IMAGE / VIDEO

request.description: Update existing campaign (Steps 2-6). Only accessible for campaigns in DRAFT or PENDING status.
Delete campaign (only DRAFT/PENDING campaigns can be deleted). Requires campaign ownership.

item.description: Core campaign management functionality for equity crowdfunding. Includes campaign CRUD operations, public listings, and file uploads for campaign assets.

item.name: üí∞ Lead Investors

request.description: Get all lead investors for a specific campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

formdata.value: This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio. This is test Bio.

request.description: Add a new lead investor to a campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

formdata.value: Updated bio with recent achievements and portfolio companies

request.description: Update lead investor information. Requires campaign ownership.
Remove lead investor from campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

formdata.description: Investor photo (PNG, JPG, JPEG)

request.description: Upload investor profile photo. Use returned URL in investor creation/update.

item.description: Management of lead investors for equity campaigns. Includes investor profiles, contact information, and investment commitments with photo uploads.

item.name: üë• Team Members

request.description: Get all team members for a specific campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Michael Chen",
  "title": "Chief Technology Officer",
  "bio": "Former senior engineer at Google with 12 years of experience in scalable systems",
  "linkedIn": "https://linkedin.com/in/michaelchen",
  "email": "michael.chen@company.com",
  "phone": "+1-555-0456",
  "experience": "12 years",
  "education": "MS Computer Science, Stanford University",
  "previousCompanies": "Google, Microsoft, Amazon",
  "photo": "https://example.com/michael-photo.jpg",
  "isFounder": false,
  "equityPercentage": 5.0,
  "displayOrder": 2
}

request.description: Add a new team member to a campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Chief Technology Officer & Co-Founder",
  "bio": "Updated bio with recent achievements and new role",
  "isFounder": true,
  "equityPercentage": 8.0,
  "displayOrder": 1
}

request.description: Update team member information. Requires campaign ownership.
Remove team member from campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

item.description: Management of campaign team members including founders, executives, and key personnel. Supports detailed profiles with roles, experience, and photo uploads.

item.name: ‚ùì Campaign FAQs

request.description: Get all FAQs for a specific campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

body.raw:
{
  "question": "What is the minimum investment amount?",
  "answer": "The minimum investment amount is $1,000. This allows smaller investors to participate in our equity crowdfunding campaign while keeping administrative costs manageable.",
  "category": "Investment Terms",
  "displayOrder": 1,
  "isPublished": true
}

request.description: Add a new FAQ to a campaign. Requires campaign ownership.
Update FAQ information. Requires campaign ownership.
Remove FAQ from campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

item.description: Frequently Asked Questions management for campaigns. Helps address common investor queries and provide detailed campaign information.

  "duration": 180,
  "category": "Product Demo",
  "displayOrder": 1,
  "isPublished": true
}

request.description: Add a new extras video to a campaign. Requires campaign ownership.
Update extras video information. Requires campaign ownership.
Remove extras video from campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

item.description: Additional video content management for campaigns. Supports promotional videos, product demos, team introductions, and other marketing materials.

request.description: Add a new extras image to a campaign. Requires campaign ownership.

item.name: üîê Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account. Rate limited to 5 requests per minute. Returns account activation token via email.

query.description: Account activation token received via email

request.description: Activate user account using token received via email after registration.

exec: console.log('JWT token and user ID saved to collection variables');

request.description: Login with email and password. Rate limited to 10 requests per minute. Returns JWT token for authentication.
Request password reset token. Rate limited to 3 requests per minute. Sends reset token via email.
Reset password using token received via email. Rate limited to 5 requests per minute.

item.description: User authentication endpoints including registration, login, account activation, and password management. All endpoints are rate-limited for security.

item.name: üè¢ Campaign

request.description: Get all active campaigns available to the public (no authentication required).

item.description: Core campaign management functionality for equity crowdfunding. Includes campaign CRUD operations, public listings, and file uploads for campaign assets.

item.name: ü©∫ Health Check

request.description: Check system health including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis connectivity. No authentication required.

item.description: System health monitoring endpoint to check the status of databases and external services. Useful for monitoring and debugging.

item.name: üìä Metrics

request.description: Get Prometheus metrics for monitoring application performance, database connections, active users, and campaign statistics. Returns metrics in Prometheus text format.

item.description: Prometheus metrics endpoint for application monitoring. Provides insights into HTTP requests, response times, database connections, active users, and campaign statistics for operational visibility.
